meanings.definition: Not open to objection or criticism; beyond reproach.
meanings.sent1: Her unexceptionable behavior at the party impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The quality of the product was unexceptionable, meeting all the standards.
meanings.sent3: The cat's unexceptionable ability to catch mice left the dog feeling inadequate.
meanings.sent4: His unexceptionable honesty shone like a beacon in the sea of deceit.
meanings.sent5: The unexceptionable cleanliness of the hospital room put the patient at ease.

meanings.sent1: The teacher found his answer unexceptionable and gave him full marks.
meanings.sent2: The hotel provided unexceptionable service to all its guests.
meanings.sent3: The unexceptionable taste of the cake made it disappear within minutes.
meanings.sent4: Her unexceptionable talent on the piano was a joy to listen to.
meanings.sent5: The unexceptionable weather made it a perfect day for a picnic.
